column5: You don't respect my work.  Funny but those kids will remember that day for the rest of their lives.
That was hilarious.  And some pretty good "ideas" of bad gifts from some of the parents.  A half eaten sandwich LOL!
totally doin that to my kids!!
The half sandwich kids were super cute.  and..   Mr. Potato head!!! hahahaha
that was good LOL thx for sharing with us dude !
most of those kids were cute in their disgust (the "hot pockets" line is a good one) but that one kid (the hater)is a big spoiled baby...not a cute display at all
That was awesome..Great idea to fire the youngsters up...I am SOOOO going to do this to my 10 year old daughter....
In all fairness to the kids thats their biggest present day of the year. That and they are conditioned to recieve really good gifts and out comes junk. How would we of acted??
